import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; const Notifications = ({ user }) => { return (

Notifications

View and manage your notifications

Notification Center

This module will provide a centralized location to view and manage all your training-related notifications and reminders.

Features coming soon:

  • View all notifications
  • Mark notifications as read
  • Course assignment notifications
  • Session reminders
  • Certificate issuance notifications
  • Email notification preferences
 ); }; export default Notifications;
